subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: On another difficult night for the Boston starters, the bench came through, and the Celtics bullied their way to a 96-89 victory to tie the N.B.A.  finals at 2-2.
snippet: On another difficult night for the Boston starters, the bench came through, and the Celtics bullied their way to a 96-89 victory to tie the N.B.A.  finals at 2-2.
